alert.note: Alert for Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 12:26PM CDT until July 01 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... Taney County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Omaha, or 13 miles north of Harrison, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Taneycomo, Bull Shoals Lake, Kissee Mills, Protem, Rueter, Ridgedale, Brownbranch, Bradleyville and Long Run. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
